europeana:record.dc:title: Revision of the European species of the genus Pygostolus Haliday (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Euphorinae), with a key to the Holarctic species
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Hymenoptera; Braconidae; Euphorinae; Centistini; Pygostolus; Nearctic; Palaearctic; Holarctic; Europe; distribution; key
europeana:record.dc:description: Pygostolus falcatus auct. consists of two species: Pygostolus falcatus (Nees, 1834) and P. otiorhynchi (Boudier, 1834). Both species are redescribed and illustrated. A key to all described species is provided. A neotype is designated for Leiophron falcatus Nees, 1834.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Revision of the European species of the genus Pygostolus Haliday (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Euphorinae), with a key to the Holarctic species (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 66) (Issue 24)
